name: Clothes Line
storyline:
Rita lives a happy retirement with no direct human contact. Her cat Cross is the only company she has (and wants). She sleeps whenever she feels like it, reads, enjoys cooking... Until something breaks her routine: garments appear hanging on the clothes line shared with the apartment opposite, which had been uninhabited for years.

Who moved in? Will we be able to help Rita go back to her peaceful life?
summary: Clothes Lines is a comical adventure game about chosen solitude. You will have to face the worst of your fears: you have a new neighbour.
